Line 12: Line 12:  
==Knowledge VS Wisdom==
 
==Knowledge VS Wisdom==
    −
Books and Teachers can only give you the KNOWLEDGE of the METHODS to the path to access WISDOM.
+
INFORMATION is a Pointer to KNOWLEDGE,KNOWLEDGE is a Pointer to WISDOM, WISDOM alone is your Key to TRUTH.
     
DEFINITION:
 
DEFINITION:
    −
1). KNOWLEDGE: it is a Collection of the Accepted Views based on what you have Seen at the Gross level,Read and Heard,and this Lacks in Direct Understanding. With Knowledge there is always a factor of Doubt, Uncertainty, Speculation, Lack of Control and is lacking in the knowledge at the Foundation level due to this there is always a dependency on Tests & Trial and Errors.
+
1). KNOWLEDGE: it is a Collection of the Accepted Views based on what you have Seen at the Gross level,Read and Heard,and this Lacks in Direct Understanding. With Knowledge there is always a factor of Doubt, Uncertainty, Speculation, Lack of Control and is lacking in the knowledge at the Foundation level due to this there is always a dependency on Tests & Trial and Errors involved.
    −
2). WISDOM: The deep understanding gained by Direct Perception at all Levels giving you the Ability to Control and Manipulate the Factors.
+
2). WISDOM: The deep understanding gained by Direct Perception at all Levels giving you the Ability to Control and Manipulate the Factors. With Wisdom there is no Factor of an Error.
    −
One of the Very best examples for someone with Mastery in Wisdom was TESLA.
+
One of the Very best examples for someone with Mastery in Wisdom was [[Nikola_Tesla|TESLA]]
